Name: Weapon Focus
Description: Add +50 per rank to attack rolls with a specific weapon. This trait applies only to normal attack rolls, not class abilities.

Name: Aetheric Focus
Description: Add +50 per rank in magical normal attacks. This trait applies only to normal attack rolls, not class abilities.

Name: Dodge/Defense
Description: Add +50 per rank to either dodging or blocking rolls.

Name: Leadership
Description: Once per combat, add +50 per rank to another's roll.

Name: Stealth
Description: Add +75 per rank to stealth rolls.

Name: Lockpicking
Description: Add +50 per rank to lockpick attempt rolls.

Name: Healing
Description: Add +50 per rank to healing rolls.

Name: Toughness
Description: Adds 1 point per rank to one's total Grit.
